version_description:
▪ Language Setting added
▪ Alarm Vibration Repeat Setting added
▪ Battery Efficiency Improvements
▪ UX improvements
▪ Bug fixes & Design improvements

### Important Notice ###
We're afraid to inform you that this update includes

▪ Today Widget added
▪ Double-Counting Bug fixed
▪ Dictionary Search Support Mode added
- This mode will help those who need to search online while focusing
measure their focus more appropriately
by increasing Resuming Chance

▪ Left Summary Panel Added
▪ Today Widget Improved
- URL Scheme supported (FocusTimer://)
▪ Daily Reset Time can be set to either 00:00 or 04:00
▪ Performance Improved
▪ Battery Efficiency Improved
▪ Image Save Function Added
▪ Chi

## Important Notice ##
IPhone 4s, 5, Touch 5th gen has been omitted by our mistake.
We support for those devices and will upload fixed update soon.
Sincerely apologize for your inconvenience

▪ Break Time Alarm added
• Focus Time Alarm r

• [New] Break Time Alarm added
• [New] Super Focus Mode added
• Focus Time Alarm renewed
• Performance Improved
• Today Widget Design Improved
• Bug Fixes

• Support for iOS10
• [New] Now support Backup/Restore (Google Drive)
• The Screen capture support including date text
• Resuming Focus Condition renovated
• Now you can start new focus more easily when unavailabe to resume focus
• Bug Fixe

看看7种新的背景形象吧。

== NEW ==
• 配置背景图像的配置功能
• 添加7种新的背景图像

== ENHANCEMENTS ==
• 主题限制扩展到9
• Design更新和用户体验改进

==FIXED==
• 修改或其它错误

我们重视您的反馈。 请将您的改进建议提交至support@realnumworks.com。

• FIXED
- 修正了关于超集中模式中的错误
- 修正了谁继续审查请求的错误
- 修正了一个小部件文本颜色白色的iOS9
- 修正为了改变主题时，未反映全面的屏幕中的错误

• ENHANCEMENTS
- 剩余时间显示准则20:00，21:00附加

### v1.5 Release Note

== NEW ==
• 配置背景图像的配置功能
• 添加7种新的背景图像

== ENHANCE

我们添加了每日目标功能，以便您不仅可以设置主题周末目标，还可以设置所有主题的今天的目标。

== NEW ==
• 每日集中目标設定

== ENHANCEMENTS ==
• 一天重新开始时间,添加08:00选项

== FIXED ==
• 修改 Google备份和还原的问题(403 Error)

我们重视您的反馈。 请将您的改进建议提交至focustimer@realnumworks.com。

== NEW ==
• 删除所有集中记录

== ENHANCEMENTS ==
• 包含捕获时间(屏幕捕获)


我们重视您的反馈。 请将您的改进建议提交至focustimer@realnumworks.com。

== NEW ==
• 删除所有集中记录

== ENHANCEMENTS ==
• 包含捕获时间(屏幕捕获)


我们重视您的反馈。 请将您的改进建议提交至focustimer@realnumworks.com。

新的壁纸和在综合画面可设置墙纸
还有，iPhone X 支持

== NEW ==
• 5个新的壁纸被添加
• 左边综合画面也可设置墙纸

== ENHANCEMENTS ==
• iPhone X 屏幕优化
• 屏幕捕获时保存在“FocusTimer”文件夹中
• 关于集中记录画面几个改善

== FIXED ==
• 修改或其它错误

我们重视您的反馈。
请将您的改进建议提交至focustimer@rea
